stage_identity.evidence: Teen-stage Byte maintains gangly proportions, fuzzy blue texture, and characteristic awkward-but-endearing posture consistent with canonical teen form from stage anchor

artifact_free.evidence: No garbled text, floating glyphs, malformed anatomy, or smeared objects detected in generated output

anchors_present.evidence: Desk, oversized laptop, and Chicago skyline window all clearly visible and properly positioned in scene. Window shows morning skyline view as expected.

temporal_mood_match.evidence: Morning lighting and awake posture match temporal state (11:57 AM Chicago time, is_sleeping=false). Content mood reflected in peaceful, refreshed atmosphere.
